data.comment: The match has started at Stade de la Mosson.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for PSG in the half of Montpellier.
Angel Di Maria of PSG gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
In the minute 4, Mikael Lesage signals a Montpellier throw-in in PSG's half.
In Montpellier, Florent Mollet of Montpellier is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Montpellier are pushing forward but Teji Savanier's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 6, Mikael Lesage awards PSG a goal kick.
Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
PSG's Layvin Kurzawa has been booked in Montpellier.
In the minute 15, Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
In Montpellier, PSG push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Mikael Lesage awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 16, Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
Free kick PSG.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Montpellier.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Montpellier have a goal kick.
Moise Kean is booked for the away team.
In the minute 24, Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for PSG in the half of Montpellier.
PSG awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 29, Florent Mollet gets his shot on target but fails to score for Montpellier.
Throw-in for PSG at Stade de la Mosson.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Colin Dagba gives PSG a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 33, Angel Di Maria instrumental with a fine assist.
Montpellier's Junior Sambia breaks free at Stade de la Mosson. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
In the minute 37, Montpellier to take a throw-in in PSG territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Montpellier.
In the minute 39, Montpellier are coming forward and Yun Il-Lok gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Mikael Lesage awards PSG a goal kick.
Goal! Stephy Mavididi levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 42, Colin Dagba for PSG has been booked by Mikael Lesage and receives a first yellow card.
Montpellier's Teji Savanier gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for PSG at Stade de la Mosson.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Mikael Lesage has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 48, PSG's Angel Di Maria misses with an attempt on goal.
Montpellier have a goal kick.
Angel Di Maria of PSG is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 49, Can PSG capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
PSG are pushing forward but Idrissa Gueye's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
In the minute 51, In Montpellier a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Moise Kean for PSG gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Montpellier.
In the minute 54, Montpellier are in shooting range from this free kick.
Montpellier attack but Gaetan Laborde's header doesn't find the target.
PSG have a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
PSG pushes forward through Moise Kean, whose finish on goal is saved.
Important block from the Montpellier defence as Idrissa Gueye fires in a strike for PSG.
In the minute 59, Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Montpellier.
Montpellier advance rapidly upfield but Mikael Lesage blows for offside.
Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
In the minute 63, Can PSG capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Montpellier's half?
Montpellier make their first substitution with Keagan Dolly replacing Yun Il-Lok.
The away team replace Ander Herrera with Leandro Paredes.
In the minute 64, Danilo Pereira is on a sub for Mitchel Bakker for PSG.
Thilo Kehrer is replacing Colin Dagba for the away team.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
In the minute 65, PSG's Angel Di Maria misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
In the minute 67, PSG to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
PSG's Angel Di Maria gets in a shot on goal at Stade de la Mosson. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In the minute 70, Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
Teji Savanier (Montpellier) has received a yellow card from Mikael Lesage.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Ambroise Oyongo is replacing Florent Mollet for the home team.
Petar Skuletic is on a sub for Stephy Mavididi for Montpellier.
In the minute 75, Mikael Lesage signals a PSG throw-in in Montpellier's half.
Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
PSG take a 1-2 lead thanks to Moise Kean.
In the minute 77, Great play from Rafinha to set up the goal.
Thomas Tuchel is making the team's fourth substitution at Stade de la Mosson with Kays Ruiz Atil replacing Idrissa Gueye.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for PSG in the half of Montpellier.
Mikael Lesage awards the home team a throw-in.
The away team replace Moise Kean with Kylian Mbappe.
Gaetan Laborde (Montpellier) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 80, Mikael Lesage awards PSG a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Montpellier!
Montpellier are coming forward and Teji Savanier gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 83, Goal kick for PSG at Stade de la Mosson.
Can Montpellier get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in PSG's half?
Timothee Pembele of PSG gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
Montpellier have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
PSG awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 88, Can Montpellier get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in PSG's half?
Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for PSG at Stade de la Mosson.
At Stade de la Mosson the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Mihailo Ristic hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Montpellier for Montpellier.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
In Montpellier a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Montpellier needs to be cautious. PSG have an attacking throw-in.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to PSG just outside Montpellier's area.
Mikael Lesage awards Montpellier a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Montpellier. The final score is 1-3.
Great finish from Kylian Mbappe to give PSG a 1-3 lead.
That's a fine assist from Layvin Kurzawa.
